kacc.description: This an LALR(1) parser generator with a lexical analyzer. You can start developing a parser with a lexer very quickly.
kacc.name: Kacc

typesetting.concept: Small and Easy, but Beautiful Design.
typesetting.description: This is a very tiny typesetting system. It is for people who think that LaTeX and CSS typesetting system is too huge and complex.
typesetting.name: Kinx Tiny Typesetting
